700428f-a.text:
Arlington Ave. (foreground, not seen), at the N.W. corner of West 256th Street, showing, in a northwesterly direction, land of the former S.D. Babcock estate.  In the right background is visible the Monastery of the Visitation, on the west side of Independence Ave.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

700429f-a.text:
Arlington Ave. (vantage point, not seen), west side, about 100 yards north of West 256th Street. The driveway, here seen, is the vehicular entrance to the Monastery of the Visitation, visible in the background. The monastery is situated on the west side of Independence
Ave. The view is in a westerly direction.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

700427f-a.text:
Arlington Ave. (vantage point, not seen), east side, about 150 feet north of West 256th Street. The view is in an easterly direction, showing a narrow road and land of the former S.D. Babcock estate.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
